meta.title: Contract #021: The Leak
meta.description: WHISTLEBLOWER: 7 Nodes, 1 Hub. Determine the source of the data exfiltration.
meta.journal: The Junior Analyst was the perfect scapegoat. The logs initially showed their credentials accessing the file, but the deep-layer trace proved it was a Remote Admin session tunneling through their account.

nodes.text: --:-- - User Access Log: 'J. Smith (Analyst) - Login Successful'.

morph.text: --:-- - User Access Log: 'Remote Admin Override (Spoofed as J. Smith)'.

nodes.text: --:-- - Data Loss Prevention: Large outgoing packet detected.
--:-- - Printer Log: 'Document Printed by J. Smith'.
--:-- - External Router: Connection to Encrypted Node.
--:-- - HR Record: 'J. Smith flagged for debt issues'.
